title: The Beautiful state of mind: Massachusetts
brief_description: Massachusetts’ forests, rivers, roads, villages in all four of the year’s seasons. A simulated colonial village, snowmobiling, bobsledding and other sequences covering the Boston symphony, a country furniture auction, canoeing, sporting events and nightlife are all highlighted in this travel documentary.
